definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: Once or twice each year, snow and sleet move into the area.
sentences.chinese: 雪和冻雨每年要光顾这个地方一两次。

sentences.english: Icy weather and freezing rain continue to batter 5 regions across southern China.
sentences.chinese: 冰冷天气和冻雨将继续侵袭南方的5个地区。

sentences.english: The authority also forecast light to moderate snow or sleet in the eastern Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 有关部门预报青藏高原东部地区将有小到中雪或冻雨。

sentences.english: Once or twice each year,snow and sleet move into the area.
sentences.chinese: 雪和冻雨每年要光顾这个地方一两次。

sentences.english: Under the sleet putty, except weak is desolate.
sentences.chinese: 冻雨下的泥，除了软弱就是冷落。

sentences.english: We made a diversion due to reports of freezing rain at our original destination.
sentences.chinese: 我们备降是由于受到目的地机场冻雨报告。

definition: frost/a patina of ice from freezing rain or water vapor
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
